page.title: 06RELIGION C.OF E.
page.content: The two churches in Southminster are St.Leonards Church of England and The United Reformed Church. We found from our survey that 169 people attended regularly in the village churches whilst 58 people attended services outside the village. 554 people attended in the village for special occasions,only 174 attended similarly outside the village.Altogether 955 people were interviewed.{ { St.Leonards Church}was erected about 1150 named after St.Leonard,Patron St. of Prisoners.Approximately 115 people,including children attend regularly at the 2 weekly services on Sundays.From May 1984-April 1985 there were 8 Baptisms 3 Weddings 7 Burials 5 Cremations.Cremations take place at Chelmsford or Southend.There are 6 organisations attached to the church.
